Indications:  -Hemodynamically unstable pulmonary embolism with RV failure, cardiac arrest or shock

Absolute Contraindications:   - History of intracranial hemorrhage, neoplasm, vascular malformation (except meningioma), or aneurysm   - Stroke, intracranial surgery, intracranial hemorrhage, subarachnoid hemorrhage, or head injury within 3 months  - Arterial puncture at a non-compressible site within 7 days   - Witnessed seizure with postictal residual neurological impairments unless clearly attributable to acute stroke   - Evidence of active bleeding or acute trauma (fracture) on examination   - Acute bleeding diathesis  - Persistent hypertension (BP greater than 185/110 mmHg) despite treatment   - Anticoagulant use within 48 hours and a prolonged PTT and / or INR greater than 1.7   - Platelet count less than 100,000 x 10^9/L    - Evidence of intracranial hemorrhage on pre-treatment non contrast head CT  - Epidural Catheter insitu

Relative Contraindications:  - Recent acute myocardial infarction (within previous 3 months)  - Pregnancy  - Age less than 18 years  - Within 14 days of major surgery or serious trauma  - Recent gastrointestinal or urinary tract hemorrhage (within previous 21 days)  - Post myocardial infarction, pericarditis or aortic dissection
